strapiPost.title: Begin Your Holiday Season With A Christmas Feast At Peel Museum
strapiPost.content:
Welcome the holiday season and support Peel Compton Foundation's community programs during Christmas at Peel Museum on Friday, December 2 from 6-9p.

  • Delicious cuisine: This annual fundraiser centers around a one-of-a-kind fine dining experience by Chef Matt Cooper of CONIFER. 
  • Merry and bright: The evening will feature seasonal music by The Reyes Trio and opportunities to bid on unique experience packages from local businesses!

Tickets are on sale now for $150. Get yours HERE.
